Namespace Mewdeko.Modules.Administration

Classes

Administration

Class for the Administration Module.

Administration.AutoAssignRoleCommands

Commands for managing auto-assign roles.

Administration.DiscordPermOverrideCommands

Module for managing Discord permission overrides. This module allows administrators to override the required permissions for a command.

Administration.GameChannelCommands

The module for managing game voice channels.

Administration.LocalizationCommands

Module for managing the bot's language settings.

Administration.LogCommands

Module for logging commands.

Administration.PrefixCommands

Module for managing the bot's prefix.

Administration.ProtectionCommands

Commands for managing the Anti-Alt, Anti-Raid, and Anti-Spam protection settings.

Administration.RoleCommands

Commands for managing roles.

Administration.SelfAssignedRolesCommands

Module for managing self-assigned roles.

Administration.ServerGreetCommands

Handles the greet and bye messages as well as boost settings bfor the server.

Administration.TimeZoneCommands

Handles commands related to time zones.

Administration.VcRoleCommands

Module for managing voice channel roles.

AutoBanRole

Command group for managing the AutoBanRole feature.

SlashAdministration

Partial class for server administration slash commands.

SlashAdministration.SlashAutoBanRole

Slash command group for managing the AutoBanRole feature.

SlashAdministration.SlashServerRecovery

The module for server recovery. Allows you to recover your server access level if th owner account is lost.

Enumerates different variations of the term "set". Used for idiots that try to do .prefix set !.

Enumerates different variations of the term "exclude". Sets whether roles are exclusive.

Enumerates different variations of the term "server".

Administration.State

Enumerates different states such as enable, disable, or inherit.
